title: News24.com | Doctors to Ramaphosa: Ongoing hard lockdown will likely cause far greater suffering than pandemic
description: Almost 30 doctors calling for the relaxation of the current hard lockdown argue they see far greater harm to the healthcare system and economy by further delaying the inevitable spread of the virus.
content:
Almost 30 doctors calling for the relaxation of the current hard lockdown argue they see far greater harm to the healthcare system and economy by further delaying the inevitable spread of the virus.
